Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 4
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IV; sheet 2; Hieratic literary text verso and recto. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto 2-5, Verso 8-10 (first part). Recto: Monotheistic Hymns Verso: A Student's Miscellany
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner. Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, pp. 28-44, Vol. 2. Plate 13, Recto 2-5 (leading edge); Plate 21, Verso 8; Plate 22, Verso 9-10 (first part). The verso of this manuscript is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) Translation: Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Literature: Volume II (1976) p.175-178. Rde 13 : 53 4.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381089) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381089)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary, bloom, fractured Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
